[[File:Electirizer.png|thumb|200px|The Electirizer]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Electirizer costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of the [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Survival Area]] in [[Sinnoh]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | Electabuzz || | Electivire |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
